title: Child's Wrapper, 1860–69
medium:
Medium: cotton, mother-of-pearl (buttons)
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Full-cut wrapper with high round neck, front opening with a few buttons at the top, long sleeves; sash caught high in back, to be tied in front. Rather course cloth with bud repeat in red and black or gray and black on picotage ground. White eyelet edging on neck.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product

tombstone.epitaph:
Child's Wrapper, 1860–69.
1860–69. Medium: cotton, mother-of-pearl (buttons)
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-181-38.
